extendedIngredients.name: bacon
extendedIngredients.original: 4-6 strips good quality, THICK bacon. Rough chopped and browned.
extendedIngredients.originalName: good quality, THICK bacon. Rough chopped and browned

extendedIngredients.name: butter
extendedIngredients.original: 1 heaping Tbsp butter (Don't use margarine or I will have to hunt you DOWN! If you want a healthier option, skip the bacon and use Olive Oil instead.)
extendedIngredients.originalName: heaping Tbsp butter (Don't use margarine or I will have to hunt you DOWN! If you want a healthier option, skip the bacon and use Olive Oil instead.)
meta: (Don't use margarine or I will have to hunt you DOWN! If you want a healthier option, skip the bacon and use Olive Oil instead.)

extendedIngredients.name: cabbage
extendedIngredients.original: 2 cups shredded cabbage, boiled for 15 minutes and drained.
extendedIngredients.originalName: shredded cabbage, boiled for 15 minutes and drained

extendedIngredients.name: onion
extendedIngredients.original: 1 small onion chopped fine. (I prefer using a sweet yellow onion and chopping it as fine as possible. On St. Paddy's I use chopped scallions because the green color is so fun.)
extendedIngredients.originalName: onion chopped fine. (I prefer using a sweet yellow onion and chopping it as fine as possible. On St. Paddy's I use chopped scallions because the green color is so fun.)

title: Bubble And Squeak
summary: Bubble And Squeak might be just the main course you are searching for. For $1.14 per serving, this recipe covers 23% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains roughly 13g of protein, 24g of fat, and a total of 396 calories. This recipe serves 2. A mixture of salt and pepper, butter, potatoes, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. To use up the potatoes you could follow this main course with the Sweet Potatoes Scones as a dessert. 20 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 77%. This score is solid. Try Bubble and Squeak, Bubble & squeak croquettes, and Luxe Bubble and Squeak for similar recipes.
